Lalaking nagipit, sa 'alter' kumapit tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747074 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/747074/lalaking-nagipit-sa-alter-kumapit/story/ Kahit galing sa mahirap na pamilya, nagsisikap sa pag-aaral si "Jay," hindi niya tunay na pangalan. Katunayan, with honors nang magtapos siya sa high school. At ngayon papasok na siya sa kolehiyo, problema niya kung saan kukuha ng pambili ng gamit para sa online schooling lalo pa't mas nabaon sa hirap ang kaniyang pamilya dahil sa pandemya. Wed, 15 Jul 2020 22:10:34 +0800

Seoul mayor s death renews #MeToo debate in South Korea tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747054 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/747054/seoul-mayor-s-death-renews-metoo-debate-in-south-korea/story/ Seoul mayor Park Won-soon's death has cast a fresh spotlight on hurdles faced by sexual harassment victims seeking justice, even as the country's feminist movement gains momentum. The mayor was found dead on Friday, days after one of his former secretaries filed a complaint alleging he had sexually harassed her. Wed, 15 Jul 2020 20:09:12 +0800
